info.title: E-commerce API
info.description: API for El Diego e-commerce application

post.summary: Authenticate user and return access token
post.description:
Authenticate a user and return an access token.

Validates the user credentials, revokes any previous tokens,
and issues a new one along with user information.
Logout the authenticated user by revoking the current token.

401.description: You must be authenticated to access this resource.

get.description: Return the currently authenticated user's information.

401.description: You must be authenticated to access this resource.

post.description:
Store a new order in the system.

Authorizes the request, prepares order data from validated input,
and delegates the creation process to the OrderService.
Rolls back and unlocks resources in case of failure.

description.example: Qui nobis recusandae beatae et maiores.

example.message: You have already placed an order with the same products.

products: You have already placed an order with the same products.

example.message: The SKU must be unique across all products.

products: The SKU must be unique across all products.

get.summary: Get a specific order by ID
get.description:
Display the specified order.

Authorizes the user to view the order and fetches it from the repository.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order to retrieve

description.example: Qui nobis recusandae beatae et maiores.

401.description: You must be authenticated to access this resource.

404.description: The order does not exist or is not available.
